Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/Pa: I wanted to become a doctor so that I could help people. Turns out I signed up for a lot of paperwork as well...
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/an: It outlined a surprisingly modern sounding medical technique. I might make use of it myself.
Eiland had me come by for consultation of an old scroll.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ba: Balor can keep his secrets. All I need to know is that he ships medicine to people in need.
Of all the places Juniper could have put her bathhouse, she had to put it next door.
Except when I can hear that laugh of hers through the wall...
I'll say this for Juniper... she's done a wonderful job reimagining this place. It's very calming.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/be: A day in the surf is just what I needed.
Walking out into the surf certainly is bracing! But one gets used to the cold soon enough.
Swimming is great exercise, you know! It's a low-impact, full-body workout.
Are you planning to do some laps, [Ari]?
But I'm at your service if that doesn't cut it.
There's no better medicine than sleeping, eating well, and living well.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/bl: Except for Juniper, it seems. She became quite irritable because I was "blocking her sun".
I'm happy to see you down on the beach, [Ari]. Most people find it relaxing.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/br: Did you eat a balanced breakfast, [Ari]? It sets the tone for your day. Here, take this.
That's what my father used to say, anyway.
Though I don't know if I'd call a dozen boiled eggs "balanced".
A balanced breakfast opens the door to a balanced day.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/bu: I don't need to tell you, but be sure to bundle up when you go outside.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ce: Celine wants me to classify her father's sense of humor as a medical condition... it's tempting...
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ch: Chin up. Turn your head to the side. Let me check your lymph nodes.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/cl: I was going to keep the clinic open today, but Hayden's right... even a doctor needs a day off every once in a while.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/co: I prescribe a pair of gloves and a fluffy pair of socks.
It's cold out there, so I suggest keeping your extremities well insulated.
Be sure to drop by if you get the sniffles, [Ari]. I'll get you sorted.
I'll need to stock up on willow bark extract before cold season hits.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/di: Sometimes an extra portion of dinner is good for soaking up the wine.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/do: [Ari], are you taking care of yourself? Or do you have someone to take care of you?
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/dr: I'm so happy I came back to Mistria to practice medicine.
I suppose this drink has made me a bit nostalgic. I was just thinking about medical university in the Capital.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ei: Be sure to get your eight hours of sleep, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/el: I don't need the help, but maybe you do, [Ari]?
I always come out here to chat with Elsie, but the conversation always turns to romance.
What exactly does Elsie think a doctor does?
Elsie loaned me a book she said was about medicine, but it's more about an adventuring physician who heals her patients with kisses.
It's almost like she's holding court, when she's up there.
Elsie really seems to like that gazebo, doesn't she?
I recently saw Elsie for a checkup, but it turned into an interrogation about aphrodisiacs. Well, I can't say she doesn't know her stuff.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/em: It's a good thing, but it can be a little lonely. Sometimes the doctor's life is a real paradox, [Ari].
An empty office means healthy patients.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/en: A bit of wine at the end of the day is quite nice.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ex: We're very lucky to have three exceptional musicians right here in Mistria.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/fa: Autumn is my favorite season for working outside. Something about the brisk air suits me.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/fl: Maple insisted I start one for her fluffy friend. It's a little unorthodox, but I'm just happy to see her take an interest.
Oh, I was just looking over Prince Rabbit's medical file.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/fo: I've got plenty of syrups in, for all occasions. Take a look.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/go: A cozy fall day is just the time to enjoy a good book, wouldn't you agree?
The General Store had everything I needed... shouldn't take too long to get my rainy day soup going.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/gr: Me? I'm the town's doctor, I run our $Clinic$. No need for formalities though, you can just call me Valen.
It's nice to meet you, Valen.
You too, [Ari]. I hope you're getting settled in alright.
Running a farm is hard work. Be sure that you get $plenty of sleep$ and $eat well$ to keep your energy up.
Hello, you must be the new farmer. [Ari], isn't it?
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ha: Hayden had an injury-free week... I suppose he just came by to talk. That's nice.
Hayden said he might stop by for a visit, so I put the ointment and gauze out. I wonder which farming implement he stabbed himself with this week...
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/he: Running around as usual I see.
It's nice that you take the time to chat, even when you're not in medical need.
As a lifelong resident of Mistria, let me know if you need any pointers.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ho: I don't know if I care for Juniper's "potions", but I can't disagree that a hot bath is good for you. Don't hesitate to indulge, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/hu: Oh, you're just saying hello. That's kind of you. Um... hello.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/hy: If you spend a lot of time in the sun, be sure to stay hydrated.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/in: The cooking at the inn is excellent and their wine cellar is expansive, if you haven't indulged yet, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ju: Every day I expect Juniper to limp in here with a twisted ankle from those ridiculous boots of hers.
Juniper's out for the morning, which makes it the perfect time for a peaceful visit to the bathhouse. She always hovers when I'm here...
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ke: [Ari], you look well! I hope you're keeping warm.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/la: Landen and my father grew up together, back when the town was more populous. Landen and Errol were always getting into trouble and my father was always patching them up.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/li: I like to keep my office clean. Nothing's more unsightly than a dusty skeleton. I'm running a clinic, not a haunted house.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/lo: Celine loaned me a very interesting book about medicinal herbs. I wonder if Nora can procure these oils and extracts for me.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/mo: Unless Juniper is at the till. Then I come back later.
This isn't medical advice per se, but I find that a bath in the morning sets a good tone for my day.
There's a particular blend of immunity-boosting tea I like to drink on rainy days... not that rainy days cause colds! I just like the taste.
I prefer less hustle and bustle, to be honest.
Mornings were so much noisier in the Capital.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/mu: I do love a nice mulled wine.
Speaking as a doctor, knowledge of the past helps me address problems of the present.
It's good that Eiland and Errol are creating a record of things.
It's always nice and quiet here. It's easy to be contemplative, hand-in-hand with nature and the past.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ni: I suspect I have you to thank for it.
Oh, hello [Ari]. Are you also doing grocery shopping? The produce is looking especially fresh today.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ol: It's uncanny how healthy Olric is. I've seen that man do his workout in the rain and snow and walk away with nary a sniffle. Terrible hayfever, though.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ou: I'm still trying to figure antidotes for these last two. You don't suppose Juniper knows, do you? She seems like she would.
It's rare that I get the chance to work out of doors, but I got lucky this week. I've been finishing up this survey of poisons.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/pl: Eiland found a record of an old plague, but after reviewing a few primary sources, I'm inclined to believe that it was just a bad case of food poisoning.
Adeline lent me a book from the manor. It outlines an outdated method of casting, but this formula for plaster is new to me.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/pr: I hope you're getting proper sleep, [Ari]. It's the foundation of a good day.
Be sure to have protein with your breakfast, [Ari]. You have a very active lifestyle.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/pu: Hm, did it just get faster?
Give me your wrist, [Ari]. You have a strong pulse, that's good.
Oh, it's quite strong. Very good.
Come here so I can check your pulse.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/ra: Rain is nice for the folks in town with allergies. It washes all that pollen away.
They're some of my favorite things to put in a hot drink on a rainy day.
When the weather is dreary, I like to stock up on ginger and =Honey=.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/re: I'm reading about the rise of Caldosian medical techniques. It's... interesting.
Welcome to the clinic, [Ari]. Now, let's have a look at you.
Let me know if you're feeling unwell, [Ari]. I'm here to help.
Oh, did you need syrups for your medicine cabinet? Have a look.
Is your medicine cabinet looking empty? I've got plenty of syrups to stock it with.
Rest brings longevity, and longevity means we'll be chatting like this for years to come.
As far as sleep goes, I always get my hours in.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/sa: The Saturday Market takes me back there.
In the Capital, I would find a nook on Main Street and read a book while people did their weekend shopping.
The Saturday Market is great for the town's health. It gets everyone up and moving!
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/sk: Landen's great-grandfather hand carved him, if you can believe it.
That skeleton has been in the family a long time.
And here I thought it was just me and the skeleton tonight. Evening, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/sl: Slow day today. I can't complain, it means everyone in town is healthy.
Slow down and have a drink, [Ari]. Mistria's not going anywhere.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/st: There's usually at least one poor soul who gets caught in the rain, so I like to be prepared at the clinic.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/sy: The Fairy Syrup has a subtle strawberry flavor, which seems popular. And if you should collapse the same day you drink it, you'll be revived.
The Heal Syrup restores some of your health. And it tastes like cherry! Some find it a bit cloying, but you wouldn't want to taste it otherwise.
The Speedy Syrup will increase your personal velocity for two hours. And it tastes like summer oranges!
Have you tried the Stamina syrup? It restores some of your stamina, and the peppermint flavor will put some pep in your step.
Have a look at the Syrups I have in stock. They're all medicinal, and have withstood rigorous testing. My father did the case studies himself.
I've got quite a few syrups in stock, if you're looking for something in particular.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/te: The last time I ran into Terithia she said she eats =Canned Sardines= for breakfast AND lunch every day. Do you know how much salt that is!?
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/to: Open your mouth and stick our your tongue, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/tr: Working outdoors is good for the spirits, but I better get back to the clinic.
Taking a walk every day is healthy, especially if you spend most of your time indoors.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/us: Hayden and I grew up together. Did you know that I used to be taller than him?
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/vi: Be sure to visit the beach, [Ari]. The sea air is good for your lungs. And the sun is a mood booster.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/wa: Keep out of the rain if you can help it, [Ari]. Just some friendly doctor's advice.
I worry about Adeline. She's so busy keeping an eye on this town, someone needs to keep an eye on her. And by "someone" I mean me, her doctor.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/we: Not all time has to be spent productively... Leisure is good for you.
Ah, [Ari]. Hope you're not spending your early days here overworking yourself.
You're new in town... I'd like to give you your first checkup. Don't worry, it's free.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/wi: A bath is especially nice in the winter. It increases your circulation, and relaxes all those stiff muscles.
I'm always running out of =Honey= in the winter.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Banked Lines/wo: Good morning. Thought I'd get a bit of fresh air with my work today.
Working late? You'll probably want this. But rest would be better!
